forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 66F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Fog early, then cloudy after midnight. Low 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 68F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
